statements: DELETE FROM quality_control_inspection WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM quality_control_inspection WHERE inspection_id = 101 AND inspector_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM quality_control_inspection WHERE inspection_result = TRUE AND product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics');
DELETE FROM quality_control_inspection WHERE id = 1 AND defect_count > 5;
DELETE FROM inspection_reports WHERE inspection_id = 10 AND report_date < '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM reports WHERE inspection_id = (SELECT inspection_id FROM inspections WHERE inspection_date < '2022-01-01');
